snippet: Mr. Tueni was considered the foremost journalist in Lebanon, if not the Arab world, and in the vanguard of a generation of postwar Arab intellectuals.
abstract: Ghassan Tueni, pre-eminent Lebanese journalist and statesman whose democratic vision for the Middle East in the 20th century prefigured the Arab Spring uprisings of the 21st century, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Tueni was considered the foremost journalist in Lebanon, if not the Arab world, and in the vanguard of a generation of postwar Arab intellectuals.

headline.main: Ghassan Tueni, Top Lebanese Journalist, Dies at 86
